verses.text: And when \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, he \w gathered|strong="H6950"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \add men\add*, which were \w warriors|strong="H6213"\w*, to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that he might \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w*.

But the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and to all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, Ye shall not go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, nor \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*: \w return|strong="H7725"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: for this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* is \w done|strong="H1961"\w* of me. And they \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* from \w going|strong="H3212"\w* against \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*.

¶ And \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* for \w defence|strong="H4692"\w* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.
He \w built|strong="H1129"\w* even \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*, and \w Etam|strong="H5862"\w*, and \w Tekoa|strong="H8620"\w*,
And \w Beth-zur|strong="H1049"\w*, and \w Shoco|strong="H7755"\w*, and \w Adullam|strong="H5725"\w*,
And \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*, and \w Mareshah|strong="H4762"\w*, and \w Ziph|strong="H2128"\w*,
And \w Adoraim|strong="H0115"\w*, and \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w*, and \w Azekah|strong="H5825"\w*,

And \w Zorah|strong="H6881"\w*, and \w Aijalon|strong="H0357"\w*, and \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, which \add are\add* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and in \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w fenced|strong="H4694"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

And he \w fortified|strong="H2388"\w* the strong \w holds|strong="H4694"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w captains|strong="H5057"\w* in them, and \w store|strong="H0214"\w* of \w victual|strong="H3978"\w*, and of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* and \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*.

And in every several \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \add he put\add* \w shields|strong="H6793"\w* and \w spears|strong="H7420"\w*, and made them \w exceeding|strong="H7235"\w* \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, having \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* on his side.

¶ And the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* that \add were\add* in all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w resorted|strong="H3320"\w* to him out of all their \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w*.\f + \fr 11.13 \ft resorted…: Heb. presented themselves to him\f*

For the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* their \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w* and their \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*, and \w came|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: for \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* had cast them \w off|strong="H2186"\w* from executing the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

And he \w ordained|strong="H5975"\w* him \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* for the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*, and for the \w devils|strong="H8163"\w*, and for the \w calves|strong="H5695"\w* which he had \w made|strong="H6213"\w*.

And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them out of all the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* such as \w set|strong="H5414"\w* their \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, to \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

So they \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and made \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w strong|strong="H0553"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*: for \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* they \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.

¶ And \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* him \w Mahalath|strong="H4258"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Jerimoth|strong="H3406"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \add and\add* \w Abihail|strong="H0032"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*;
Which \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* him \w children|strong="H1121"\w*; \w Jeush|strong="H3266"\w*, and \w Shamariah|strong="H8114"\w*, and \w Zaham|strong="H2093"\w*.

And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* her he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Maachah|strong="H4601"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*; which \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* him \w Abijah|strong="H0029"\w*, and \w Attai|strong="H6262"\w*, and \w Ziza|strong="H2124"\w*, and \w Shelomith|strong="H8019"\w*.\f + \fr 11.20 \ft Maachah: she is also called Michaiah the daughter of Uriel\f*

And \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* \w Maachah|strong="H4601"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* above all his \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* and his \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w*: (for he \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \w eighteen|strong="H8083"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, and \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w*; and \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*.)

And \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w made|strong="H5975"\w* \w Abijah|strong="H0029"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Maachah|strong="H4601"\w* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w*, \add to be\add* \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w* among his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*: for \add he thought\add* to make him \w king|strong="H4427"\w*.

And he dealt \w wisely|strong="H0995"\w*, and \w dispersed|strong="H6555"\w* of all his \w children|strong="H1121"\w* throughout all the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, unto every \w fenced|strong="H4694"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: and he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them \w victual|strong="H4202"\w* in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*. And he \w desired|strong="H7592"\w* \w many|strong="H1995"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*.\f + \fr 11.23 \ft many wives: Heb. a multitude of wives\f*
